snippet.title: 《苍天煌姬拉碧丝菲莉亚》官方PV 【黃油上新】
snippet.description:
Store: https://saikeystudios.com/zh-hans/product/shining-princess-lapisphilia/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=post
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3253560/Shining_Princess_Lapisphilia/?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=post

正義的女英雄拉碧絲菲莉亞一次次擊退了蓋斯塔克斯的邪惡勢力！面對節節敗退的局面，他們拼盡全力建造了一座陰森的地牢，試圖將她徹底擊垮！穿越敵人設置的障礙與危險陷阱，逃出地牢，重回地面展開反擊吧！

關注來自我們的其他平臺:
►Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/Saikey
►Steam群: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/saikey
►推特: https://twitter.com/SaikeyStudios
►Discord群: https://discord.com/invite/EaqZEsP3pV
►官方網站: https://saikeystudios.com/
